snippet: The case could lead to steep tariffs on much of China’s exports of solar products to Europe. China has threatened to retaliate against European wines and industrial materials.
abstract: European Union will launch broad investigation into whether Chinese companies have been exporting solar panels for less than it costs to make them; case could lead to steep tariffs on much of China’s $20 billion in exports of solar products; China has threatened to retaliate against European wines and industrial materials.
lead_paragraph: The case could lead to steep tariffs on much of China’s exports of solar products to Europe. China has threatened to retaliate against European wines and industrial materials.

headline.main: Europe to Investigate Chinese Exports of Solar Panels
headline.print_headline: Europe to Investigate Chinese Exports of Solar Panels
